description: Title, your name, contact details, plain language summary < 300 words

Single page, background, hypothesis, outline of design, methods, significance [see research potential criterion at NSERC for guidance](https://www.nserc-crsng.gc.ca/students-etudiants/pg-cs/cgsm-bescm_eng.asp)
At least 5 studies published within last 5 years
